summary: I am at the core a fun person who likes to connect with others through their ideas but also interpersonally. My non-linear thinking makes it easy for me to link disparate facts and recognize patterns. Given my high levels of empathy, I would like, moving forward, to use this brain power to see how people can work together and help them get there.
